issue.title: Bump ejs from 2.4.1 to 2.5.5 in /topside

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

issue.body:
Bumps [ejs](https://github.com/mde/ejs) from 2.4.1 to 2.5.5.
Release notes *Sourced from [ejs's releases](https://github.com/mde/ejs/releases).* > ## v2.5.5 > - Allow 'filename' for opts-in-data, but sanitize when rendered ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > > ## v2.5.4 > - Blackist more options from opts-in-data ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > - Allow trailing comments in output modes ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > - Added 'name' attribute for easy identification ([@​designfrontier](https://github.com/designfrontier)) > > ## v2.5.3 > - Blackist 'root' option from opts-in-data ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > > ## v2.5.2 > - Added link to EJS Playground ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > - Revert express auto 'root' option ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > > ## v2.5.1 > - Output literal `%>` with `%%>` (Roy Miloh) > - Allow setting project root for includes ([@​cnwhy](https://github.com/cnwhy)) > - UMD support for the browser ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > - Exported `escapeXML` method to allow manual escaping of output > - Tests for strict mode ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim), [@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > - Added ESLint for project source code ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > - Whitespace slurp in preprocessor include ([@​mmis1000](https://github.com/mmis1000)) > - Improved line-number handling in errors ([@​Spikef](https://github.com/Spikef)) > - Various doc improvements ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim), Ionică Bizău) > > ## v2.4.2 > - Added LICENSE file to release package > - Various documentation improvements ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > - Better line-numbers in errors ([@​dgofman](https://github.com/dgofman))
Changelog *Sourced from [ejs's changelog](https://github.com/mde/ejs/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md).* > ## v2.5.5: 2016-12-06 > > * Allow 'filename' for opts-in-data, but sanitize when rendered ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > > ## v2.5.4: 2016-12-05 > > * Blackist more options from opts-in-data ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > * Allow trailing comments in output modes ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > + Added 'name' attribute for easy identification ([@​designfrontier](https://github.com/designfrontier)) > > ## v2.5.3: 2016-11-28 > > * Blackist 'root' option from opts-in-data ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > > ## v2.5.2: 2016-07-25 > > + Added link to EJS Playground ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > - Revert express auto 'root' option ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > > ## v2.5.1: 2016-07-25 > > + Output literal `%>` with `%%>` (Roy Miloh) > + Allow setting project root for includes ([@​cnwhy](https://github.com/cnwhy)) > + UMD support for the browser ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > + Exported `escapeXML` method to allow manual escaping of output ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > + Tests for strict mode ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim), [@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > + Added ESLint for project source code ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > * Whitespace slurp in preprocessor include ([@​mmis1000](https://github.com/mmis1000)) > * Improved line-number handling in errors ([@​Spikef](https://github.com/Spikef)) > * Various doc improvements ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim), Ionică Bizău) > > ## v2.4.2: 2016-05-24 > > + Added LICENSE file to release package > * Various documentation improvements ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > * Better line-numbers in errors ([@​dgofman](https://github.com/dgofman))
Commits - [`a63b973`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/a63b9731c49c62358bb3f220839a64cd66652a40) Version 2.5.5 - [`4b474a6`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/4b474a682611a2a663ea476745529e6d361aade6) Updated Changelog for release - [`d4e6142`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/d4e61428c3d8b27e6873eaa86a47909f88b2964d) Allow 'filename' opt passed in data, but sanitize when rendered - [`2aa2123`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/2aa2123daf233bd0930abe8074aed6221f62ddc5) Version 2.5.4 - [`aa1bee3`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/aa1bee35c63b1c14485ef6182c50f688572aa644) Missing semi - [`590a246`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/590a246b2be8368fb466cdbcbe426e47d1521e06) Lint before running tests - [`f3ec6fc`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/f3ec6fcedbc439cf3e5452f248f1009c2df24cd9) Updated Changelog for release - [`3a534a9`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/3a534a965f0f7bfc6c287a376d2a40a7abcbdeb5) Refactored opts-in-data passing, cleaner util method - [`54f7653`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/54f7653df16414a4f7aa9e61c453d8f70641bd7d) Merge pull request [#220](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mde/ejs/issues/220) from designfrontier/feature/add-naming - [`706987b`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/706987bda85278e7fc321757782ae5c06f6f8795) Adds a name attribute for easy identification - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/mde/ejs/compare/v2.4.1...v2.5.5)
Maintainer changes This version was pushed to npm by [mde](https://www.npmjs.com/~mde), a new releaser for ejs since your current version.

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=ejs&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=2.4.1&new-version=2.5.5)](https://help.github.com/articles/configuring-automated-security-fixes) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot ignore this [patch|minor|major] version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor/major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot use these labels` will set the current labels as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these reviewers` will set the current reviewers as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these assignees` will set the current assignees as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use this milestone` will set the current milestone as the default for future PRs for this repo and language You can disable automated security fix PRs for this repo from the [Security Alerts page](https://github.com/xoahmi/hpp2019/network/alerts).

issue.title: Bump ejs from 2.4.1 to 2.5.5 in /hpp2019

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

issue.body:
Bumps [ejs](https://github.com/mde/ejs) from 2.4.1 to 2.5.5.
Release notes *Sourced from [ejs's releases](https://github.com/mde/ejs/releases).* > ## v2.5.5 > - Allow 'filename' for opts-in-data, but sanitize when rendered ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > > ## v2.5.4 > - Blackist more options from opts-in-data ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > - Allow trailing comments in output modes ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > - Added 'name' attribute for easy identification ([@​designfrontier](https://github.com/designfrontier)) > > ## v2.5.3 > - Blackist 'root' option from opts-in-data ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > > ## v2.5.2 > - Added link to EJS Playground ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > - Revert express auto 'root' option ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > > ## v2.5.1 > - Output literal `%>` with `%%>` (Roy Miloh) > - Allow setting project root for includes ([@​cnwhy](https://github.com/cnwhy)) > - UMD support for the browser ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > - Exported `escapeXML` method to allow manual escaping of output > - Tests for strict mode ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim), [@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > - Added ESLint for project source code ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > - Whitespace slurp in preprocessor include ([@​mmis1000](https://github.com/mmis1000)) > - Improved line-number handling in errors ([@​Spikef](https://github.com/Spikef)) > - Various doc improvements ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim), Ionică Bizău) > > ## v2.4.2 > - Added LICENSE file to release package > - Various documentation improvements ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > - Better line-numbers in errors ([@​dgofman](https://github.com/dgofman))
Changelog *Sourced from [ejs's changelog](https://github.com/mde/ejs/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md).* > ## v2.5.5: 2016-12-06 > > * Allow 'filename' for opts-in-data, but sanitize when rendered ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > > ## v2.5.4: 2016-12-05 > > * Blackist more options from opts-in-data ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > * Allow trailing comments in output modes ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > + Added 'name' attribute for easy identification ([@​designfrontier](https://github.com/designfrontier)) > > ## v2.5.3: 2016-11-28 > > * Blackist 'root' option from opts-in-data ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > > ## v2.5.2: 2016-07-25 > > + Added link to EJS Playground ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > - Revert express auto 'root' option ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > > ## v2.5.1: 2016-07-25 > > + Output literal `%>` with `%%>` (Roy Miloh) > + Allow setting project root for includes ([@​cnwhy](https://github.com/cnwhy)) > + UMD support for the browser ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > + Exported `escapeXML` method to allow manual escaping of output ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > + Tests for strict mode ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim), [@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > + Added ESLint for project source code ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > * Whitespace slurp in preprocessor include ([@​mmis1000](https://github.com/mmis1000)) > * Improved line-number handling in errors ([@​Spikef](https://github.com/Spikef)) > * Various doc improvements ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim), Ionică Bizău) > > ## v2.4.2: 2016-05-24 > > + Added LICENSE file to release package > * Various documentation improvements ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > * Better line-numbers in errors ([@​dgofman](https://github.com/dgofman))
Commits - [`a63b973`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/a63b9731c49c62358bb3f220839a64cd66652a40) Version 2.5.5 - [`4b474a6`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/4b474a682611a2a663ea476745529e6d361aade6) Updated Changelog for release - [`d4e6142`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/d4e61428c3d8b27e6873eaa86a47909f88b2964d) Allow 'filename' opt passed in data, but sanitize when rendered - [`2aa2123`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/2aa2123daf233bd0930abe8074aed6221f62ddc5) Version 2.5.4 - [`aa1bee3`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/aa1bee35c63b1c14485ef6182c50f688572aa644) Missing semi - [`590a246`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/590a246b2be8368fb466cdbcbe426e47d1521e06) Lint before running tests - [`f3ec6fc`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/f3ec6fcedbc439cf3e5452f248f1009c2df24cd9) Updated Changelog for release - [`3a534a9`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/3a534a965f0f7bfc6c287a376d2a40a7abcbdeb5) Refactored opts-in-data passing, cleaner util method - [`54f7653`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/54f7653df16414a4f7aa9e61c453d8f70641bd7d) Merge pull request [#220](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mde/ejs/issues/220) from designfrontier/feature/add-naming - [`706987b`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/706987bda85278e7fc321757782ae5c06f6f8795) Adds a name attribute for easy identification - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/mde/ejs/compare/v2.4.1...v2.5.5)
Maintainer changes This version was pushed to npm by [mde](https://www.npmjs.com/~mde), a new releaser for ejs since your current version.

issue.title: Bump ejs from 2.4.1 to 2.5.5 in /hpp2019

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

issue.body:
Bumps [ejs](https://github.com/mde/ejs) from 2.4.1 to 2.5.5.
Release notes *Sourced from [ejs's releases](https://github.com/mde/ejs/releases).* > ## v2.5.5 > - Allow 'filename' for opts-in-data, but sanitize when rendered ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > > ## v2.5.4 > - Blackist more options from opts-in-data ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > - Allow trailing comments in output modes ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > - Added 'name' attribute for easy identification ([@​designfrontier](https://github.com/designfrontier)) > > ## v2.5.3 > - Blackist 'root' option from opts-in-data ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > > ## v2.5.2 > - Added link to EJS Playground ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > - Revert express auto 'root' option ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > > ## v2.5.1 > - Output literal `%>` with `%%>` (Roy Miloh) > - Allow setting project root for includes ([@​cnwhy](https://github.com/cnwhy)) > - UMD support for the browser ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > - Exported `escapeXML` method to allow manual escaping of output > - Tests for strict mode ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim), [@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > - Added ESLint for project source code ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > - Whitespace slurp in preprocessor include ([@​mmis1000](https://github.com/mmis1000)) > - Improved line-number handling in errors ([@​Spikef](https://github.com/Spikef)) > - Various doc improvements ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim), Ionică Bizău) > > ## v2.4.2 > - Added LICENSE file to release package > - Various documentation improvements ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > - Better line-numbers in errors ([@​dgofman](https://github.com/dgofman))
Changelog *Sourced from [ejs's changelog](https://github.com/mde/ejs/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md).* > ## v2.5.5: 2016-12-06 > > * Allow 'filename' for opts-in-data, but sanitize when rendered ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > > ## v2.5.4: 2016-12-05 > > * Blackist more options from opts-in-data ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > * Allow trailing comments in output modes ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > + Added 'name' attribute for easy identification ([@​designfrontier](https://github.com/designfrontier)) > > ## v2.5.3: 2016-11-28 > > * Blackist 'root' option from opts-in-data ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > > ## v2.5.2: 2016-07-25 > > + Added link to EJS Playground ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > - Revert express auto 'root' option ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > > ## v2.5.1: 2016-07-25 > > + Output literal `%>` with `%%>` (Roy Miloh) > + Allow setting project root for includes ([@​cnwhy](https://github.com/cnwhy)) > + UMD support for the browser ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > + Exported `escapeXML` method to allow manual escaping of output ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > + Tests for strict mode ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim), [@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > + Added ESLint for project source code ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > * Whitespace slurp in preprocessor include ([@​mmis1000](https://github.com/mmis1000)) > * Improved line-number handling in errors ([@​Spikef](https://github.com/Spikef)) > * Various doc improvements ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim), Ionică Bizău) > > ## v2.4.2: 2016-05-24 > > + Added LICENSE file to release package > * Various documentation improvements ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > * Better line-numbers in errors ([@​dgofman](https://github.com/dgofman))
Commits - [`a63b973`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/a63b9731c49c62358bb3f220839a64cd66652a40) Version 2.5.5 - [`4b474a6`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/4b474a682611a2a663ea476745529e6d361aade6) Updated Changelog for release - [`d4e6142`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/d4e61428c3d8b27e6873eaa86a47909f88b2964d) Allow 'filename' opt passed in data, but sanitize when rendered - [`2aa2123`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/2aa2123daf233bd0930abe8074aed6221f62ddc5) Version 2.5.4 - [`aa1bee3`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/aa1bee35c63b1c14485ef6182c50f688572aa644) Missing semi - [`590a246`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/590a246b2be8368fb466cdbcbe426e47d1521e06) Lint before running tests - [`f3ec6fc`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/f3ec6fcedbc439cf3e5452f248f1009c2df24cd9) Updated Changelog for release - [`3a534a9`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/3a534a965f0f7bfc6c287a376d2a40a7abcbdeb5) Refactored opts-in-data passing, cleaner util method - [`54f7653`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/54f7653df16414a4f7aa9e61c453d8f70641bd7d) Merge pull request [#220](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mde/ejs/issues/220) from designfrontier/feature/add-naming - [`706987b`](https://github.com/mde/ejs/commit/706987bda85278e7fc321757782ae5c06f6f8795) Adds a name attribute for easy identification - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/mde/ejs/compare/v2.4.1...v2.5.5)

issue.body:
Bumps [ejs](https://github.com/mde/ejs) from 2.4.1 to 2.5.5.
Release notes *Sourced from [ejs's releases](https://github.com/mde/ejs/releases).* > ## v2.5.5 > - Allow 'filename' for opts-in-data, but sanitize when rendered ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > > ## v2.5.4 > - Blackist more options from opts-in-data ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > - Allow trailing comments in output modes ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > - Added 'name' attribute for easy identification ([@​designfrontier](https://github.com/designfrontier)) > > ## v2.5.3 > - Blackist 'root' option from opts-in-data ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > > ## v2.5.2 > - Added link to EJS Playground ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > - Revert express auto 'root' option ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > > ## v2.5.1 > - Output literal `%>` with `%%>` (Roy Miloh) > - Allow setting project root for includes ([@​cnwhy](https://github.com/cnwhy)) > - UMD support for the browser ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > - Exported `escapeXML` method to allow manual escaping of output > - Tests for strict mode ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim), [@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > - Added ESLint for project source code ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > - Whitespace slurp in preprocessor include ([@​mmis1000](https://github.com/mmis1000)) > - Improved line-number handling in errors ([@​Spikef](https://github.com/Spikef)) > - Various doc improvements ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim), Ionică Bizău) > > ## v2.4.2 > - Added LICENSE file to release package > - Various documentation improvements ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > - Better line-numbers in errors ([@​dgofman](https://github.com/dgofman))
Changelog *Sourced from [ejs's changelog](https://github.com/mde/ejs/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md).* > ## v2.5.5: 2016-12-06 > > * Allow 'filename' for opts-in-data, but sanitize when rendered ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > > ## v2.5.4: 2016-12-05 > > * Blackist more options from opts-in-data ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > * Allow trailing comments in output modes ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > + Added 'name' attribute for easy identification ([@​designfrontier](https://github.com/designfrontier)) > > ## v2.5.3: 2016-11-28 > > * Blackist 'root' option from opts-in-data ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > > ## v2.5.2: 2016-07-25 > > + Added link to EJS Playground ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > - Revert express auto 'root' option ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > > ## v2.5.1: 2016-07-25 > > + Output literal `%>` with `%%>` (Roy Miloh) > + Allow setting project root for includes ([@​cnwhy](https://github.com/cnwhy)) > + UMD support for the browser ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > + Exported `escapeXML` method to allow manual escaping of output ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > + Tests for strict mode ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim), [@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > + Added ESLint for project source code ([@​mde](https://github.com/mde)) > * Whitespace slurp in preprocessor include ([@​mmis1000](https://github.com/mmis1000)) > * Improved line-number handling in errors ([@​Spikef](https://github.com/Spikef)) > * Various doc improvements ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim), Ionică Bizău) > > ## v2.4.2: 2016-05-24 > > + Added LICENSE file to release package > * Various documentation improvements ([@​RyanZim](https://github.com/RyanZim)) > * Better line-numbers in errors ([@​dgofman](https://github.com/dgofman))
